hockey_key: Ask a Tech Lead for the hockey key if needed
hockey_develop_id: Run './bin/hockey.sh {{ cookiecutter.hockey_key }} "{{ cookiecutter.project_name }}" {{ cookiecutter.bundle_identifier }} Develop', or enter DEVELOP_ID and update later
hockey_sprint_id: Run './bin/hockey.sh {{ cookiecutter.hockey_key }} "{{ cookiecutter.project_name }}" {{ cookiecutter.bundle_identifier }} Sprint', or enter SPRINT_ID and update later
